item.title: Teamcape problem

item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4516 && AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514) { } else { sendMessage("This player is in your team!"); }

You’ll get that error due to the fact your method has no body.

item.title: Teamcape problem

item.description:
@xpatx wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerCape == 4516 && AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514); } else { sendMessage("This player is in your team!"); }

should be

if (playerEquipment[playerCape == 4516 && AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514) { } else { sendMessage("This player is in your team!"); }

item.title: Teamcape problem
item.dc:creator: @airborne airborne
item.description:
@airborne wrote:

Lol? Read the code. It’s saying this to you:
If you are wearing this team cape, and the person you are attacking has that same team cape, it cancels your attack and tells you you can’t attack your own team.
It’s obvious. Back up your file, just in case, but, try removing that, and if that doesn’t work, try deleting the ResetAttack. I think that is what is making it stop attack. I’m not that good of a coder though, so that is why I say back your file up.

Read full topic

item.title: Teamcape problem
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

I wanna have a teamcape but if you wear the cape you cant attack anyone with they same team cape
here is a code what i already have (no errors but dont work)

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4516 && AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4516) { sendMessage("You can't attack your own team."); ResetAttack(); return true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514 && AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514) { sendMessage("You can't attack your own team."); ResetAttack(); return true; }
plz help me :o

Read full topic
